content.raw:
Resolved material color issue.

In [2d6deb3](#!/osrf/vrx/commits/2d6deb3651f00c42127ab62cf3f1bb9cc712f526), I added the gazebo material tag, but it didn’t work. 

In [48d7669](#!/osrf/vrx/commits/48d76690896a10cdde0f05f914954999ffd23f79), after some investigation, I found out this was the reason why. The visual tag name was causing an issue with parsing.

`<visual name="visual">` => `<visual>`

[https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/issues/132/parser-does-not-handle-urdf-material](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/issues/132/parser-does-not-handle-urdf-material)
content.html:
Resolved material color issue.

In 2d6deb3, I added the gazebo material tag, but it didn’t work.

In 48d7669, after some investigation, I found out this was the reason why. The visual tag name was causing an issue with parsing.

<visual name="visual"> => <visual>

https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/issues/132/parser-does-not-handle-urdf-material
